verbs.description: [ARG0: A U.S. farm leader] [V: offered] [ARG1: a downbeat outlook for American farmers] [ARGM-LOC: in congressional testimony] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARGM-TMP: before a hearing on tariff impacts] , [ARGM-ADV: countering a rosy view provided by President Donald Trump] .

[ARG0: A U.S. farm leader] offered a downbeat outlook for American farmers in congressional testimony Thursday before a hearing on tariff impacts , [V: countering] [ARG1: a rosy view provided by President Donald Trump] .

A U.S. farm leader offered a downbeat outlook for American farmers in congressional testimony Thursday before a hearing on tariff impacts , countering [ARG1: a rosy view] [V: provided] [ARG0: by President Donald Trump] .
